page.title: 03INTERVIEW WITH HEADMASTER.
page.content: { {1, WHEN WAS THE SCHOOL BUILT ? IN 1964 THEY STARTED BUILDING THE SCHOOL. {2, HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN HEADMASTER ? FOR SIX YEARS. {3, DO YOU ENJOY WORKING HERE ? YES. {4, HOW LONG HAS THE ANNEX BEEN IN {USE ? IT WAS PART OF THE OLD SCHOOL AND HAS BEEN IN USE SINCE 1945. {5, WERE THERE ALWAYS OCKBROOK AND {BORROWASH PUPILS COMING HERE ? NO THERE WERE NOT.ORIGINALLY SANDIACRE AND RISLEY PUPILS CAME HERE. THEN EVERYONE FROM OCKBROOK AND NO ONE FROM BORROWASH CAME.BUT BORROWASH PUPILS COULD APPLY. {6, HOW LONG HAS THE BUS SYSTEM {BEEN IN USE ? SIX YEARS.
